title: TEAM T-Force SIREN GD240E All-In-One ARGB CPU Liquid Cooler
product_list_short_description: Separated Pump and CPU for Best Thermal Conductivity

cat_seo_keywords: TEAM CPU Cooler, All-in-One Liquid Cooler
product_page_short_description: Separated Pump and CPU for Best Thermal Conductivity
full_description:
TEAM T-Force SIREN GD240E All-In-One ARGB CPU Liquid Cooler

The TEAM T-Force SIREN GD240E CPU Cooler features Mirror ARGB. The two-toned, black-and-white ARBG cooling device and high-powered ARGB fans are destined to command attention. It supports lighting controllers from ASUS, Gigabyte, MSI, ASRock, and more so that you can customize your own lighting effects. It comes with a separated Pump and CPU for Best Thermal Conductivity. It comes with a pump inside a radiator to prevent pump vibrations from damaging the CPU. Heat is dissipated directly through the radiator for safer heat conduction pathways. The ultra-powerful 4000 RPM pump can deliver speeds of up to 1.5X faster than regular liquid cooling devices available on the market while guaranteeing minimal noise. This Liquid Cooler is made from aluminum for effective waste heat conduction from the CPU. The high-density jet fin drastically increases the cooling surface for better cooling efficacy. The SIREN GD240E features Dual Protection. The thin nylon tubes are reinforced with a rubber tube to protect the cooling tubes from any damage throughout the process.  The TEAM T-Force SIREN GD240E comes with 2 years of warranty.

title: TEAM T-Force SIREN GD360E All-In-One ARGB CPU Liquid Cooler
cat_seo_title: TEAM CPU Cooler Price in Bangladesh | Star Tech
cat_seo_description: Buy TEAM CPU Cooler at best price in Bangladesh. Keep your processor cool with latest TEAM All-in-One CPU Cooler, available at Star Tech online shop. Order for delivery in BD.
cat_seo_keywords: TEAM CPU Cooler, All-in-One Liquid Cooler
full_description:
TEAM T-Force SIREN GD360E All-In-One ARGB CPU Liquid Cooler

The T-FORCE SIREN GD360E All-in-One ARGB CPU Liquid Cooler reduces noise and protects the CPU from pump vibrations. In contrast to standard cooling methods, we elected to house the pump within a radiator. The copper aluminum water block and jet-fin design are enhanced by PWM control, which adjusts the rotating speed of the fan based on temperature to promote optimal cooling. Many lighting control software is supported by the mirror ARGB Water Block and ARGB fans. It has a separate pump and CPU water block for longer CPU service life. This is for a 4000RPM pump with little noise and high performance. It has a PWM-controlled Hydraulic Bearing Fan. It is backwards compatible with INTEL LGA 1700, 1150, 1151, 1155, 1156, 1200, 1366, 2011, 2011-3, 2066 and AMD AM5, AM4, FM2+, FM2, FM1, AM3+, AM3, AM2+, AM2+, AM3+, AM3+, AM3+, AM3+, AM3+, AM3+, AM3+, AM3+, AM. The TEAM T-Force SIREN GD360E ARGB CPU Liquid Cooler comes with a 02-year warranty.
